title: Taylor Swift: Love Story
description: Taylor Swift Love Story is more than a biography; it s all the information you ever wanted to know about this music sensation. Did you ever wonder what Taylor s former music teachers think of her success? Or which boys inspired her hit songs? Are you curious what s on Taylors iPod? Or how she celebrates the holidays? This detailed book answers all of these questions and more, from her childhood in Pennsylvania to her Fearless tour, and everything in between! Taylor Love Story is a must have for all Taylor Swift Fans.
author: Amy Gail Hansen
